body:
Hiya,

I recently got Cinema4D (demo) and have started to play around with some rigs. I also bought Weedlion's paid rig and I decided to change the skin (so it doesn't look like a Steve) But when I changed the skin, it was all weird, the pants were where the head should be and all that. I was wondering if anyone could help, it's really frustrating me. Keep mine that it's just a regular skin file I downloaded from Miners Need Cool Shoes.

Thanks in advance,
-Sky

title: Cinema4D Help
